name: Transplanted (pyrecraft)
description:
Help Astro get back home by farming different foods that can be turned into fuel to make his return trip. 

Controls

ARROW KEYS, WASD - Move

Q, E - Switch between items in inventory

SPACE - Plant Seeds, Water Plants, Interact, Do Action

Gameplay Mechanics

  • Use Q and E to scroll between inventory items. Use seeds on the dirt patches to plant seeds.
  • Use your watering can to water your crops. Water your crops everyday. Refill your watering can with the water container on the right. Keep in mind water is limited. Once it runs out, it's gone so be conservative.
  • Interact (SPACE) with the space ship to go to sleep and start the next day.
  • Turn your food into fuel by using the food you grow on the container on the left. Once the container is filled, hooray! - Astro will have enough fuel to go home.
  • Astro will get hungry. Use food to feed Astro as well by selecting it from your inventory. If your hunger goes to 0%, you will lose.
  • If your sanity goes to 0% you lose. It will decrease slowly over time.

Crops

Tomato

  • Feeds 10%
  • Takes 3 days to grow
  • Provides 3% fuel

Potato

  • Feeds 20%
  • Takes 5 days to grow
  • Provides 5% fuel

Corn

  • Feeds 10%
  • Takes 5 days to grow
  • Provides 10% fuel
